Button.TooltipReference: Click to set the price of the currently selected item. This will also store the price of the item in your INI file.
Click to clear the price of the currently selected item. This will also remove your INI entry for this item.
List all items that you currently have available for sale to other players.
Click to add all items currently with a price to the bazaar list and to become a merchant.
Click to remove all items from the bazaar list and no longer be a merchant.
Click to enter Offline Trader Mode.
Click to add a single item to your bazaar list.
Click to remove a single item from your bazaar list.
